OOC: Cyberwolf, what are you talking about? Prebon is no where near 
you. He doesn't know anything about you?

Blaze had put in Striker's new personality, and she had repaired most 
of his damaged systems. But the head....he had completly destroyed 
his own head. It was amazing that this bot had survived. It was 
almost like the chip was a fate worse than death. It didn't matter. 
He would be serving Prebon soon enough, as his top mercenairy. She 
even installed a new name for Striker to go by. As far The Trainers 
were concerned, Striker was dead. Only his shell remains. His sprak 
had been completly re-formatted. But back to topic, the head needed 
to be replaced. She carefully disconected it from his body, and 
through it aside. Now how was she supposed to make a new head? Wait! 
She had it! She picked up Striker's old head, and popped the face 
plate off. It had been virtually undamaged, except for a few blac 
spots. Now she needed a new main part. She went to the cargo area 
where the boys were building their new toy.

"Yo, do you guys need the head of the bot you killed?"

"No, here. Take it!" Hammer through her K9's head. She went back to 
the bridge and popped the face plate off, and attached Striker's 
plate. Now all it needed was some minor repairs. She got to work on 
that, thinking how this bot was going to act when he was finished.
